abstract: A senior Citigroup executive said the bank was comfortable with its valuation for an asset that one accounting expert expects to be written down.
snippet: A senior Citigroup executive said the bank was comfortable with its valuation for an asset that one accounting expert expects to be written down.
lead_paragraph: A senior Citigroup executive said the bank is comfortable with its valuation for an asset that one accounting expert expects to be written down, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Citigroup Stands by Deferred Tax Asset Valuation
